actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to establish an Auto Insurance Rate Reduction Commission to study the impact of fuel conservation actions on auto insurance costs and to recommend legislation which would implement appropriate reductions in auto insurance premiums.
short_title: Auto Insurance Rate Reduction Commission Act

summary.text: Auto Insurance Rate Reduction Commission Act - Establishes the Auto Insurance Rate Reduction Commission. Directs the Commission to study the impact of fuel conservation actions on auto insurance costs and to recommend legislation which would implement appropriate reductions in auto insurance premiums. Sets forth duties of the Commission. Provides the Commission with powers to carry out this Act. Authorizes appropriations as may be necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: Auto Insurance Rate Reduction Commission Act

A bill to establish an Auto Insurance Rate Reduction Commission to study the impact of fuel conservation actions on auto insurance costs and to recommend legislation which would implement appropriate reductions in auto insurance premiums.
